articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives On-the-Spot Guidance to Creation of Opera "Hong Lu Meng"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives On-the-Spot Guidance to Creation of Opera "Hong Lu Meng"
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave on-the-spot guidance to the creation of the Opera "Hong Lu Meng."
					 He was greeted on the spot by leading officials of the Phibada Opera Troupe and officials concerned.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the creation of the opera, he watched the Opera "Hong Lu Meng" in the process of creation.
					
					 The Phibada Opera Troupe is recreating the Opera "Hong Lu Meng," which had been created and staged in the 1960s, as required by the new century true to the instruction of Kim Jong Il to recreate and widely perform it this year, "the year of DPRK-China friendship."
					
					 After appreciating the opera, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the creators and artistes of the troupe produced a splendid opera fully meeting the requirements of the original work by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm. He highly appreciated their successful creation and extended sincere thanks to them.
					
					 Noting that the Opera "Hong Lu Meng" was created in a brief span of time but all its elements ranging from songs, orchestration and stage decor to costumes are on a high artistic level, he said that the success made by the Phibada Opera Troupe proves that it is possible to bring about a remarkable creative upswing when the innovative judgment of the 21st century is combined with the creative mode and work style dating back to the 1970s. 
					
					 Underscoring the need to round off the Opera "Hong Lu Meng" on the best level and stage it for our people this year, "the year of DPRK-China friendship," he specified tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 It is the invariable will of our party and people to further consolidate and develop the precious DPRK-China friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung and leaders of the elder generation of China for a long period, he said, adding that the cultural exchange plays an important role in boosting the friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 He was accompanied by Secretary Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Jang Song Thaek, Choe Ik Gyu and Kim Yang Gon of the Central Committee of the WPK and First Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kang Sok Ju.

articles.title: Two Americans detained for illegally intruding
articles.content:
Two Americans detained for illegally intruding
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Two Americans were detained on March 17 while illegally intruding into the territory of the DPRK by crossing the DPRK-China border.
					 A competent organ is now investigating the case.

articles.title: Premier of DPRK Cabinet Backs from China
articles.content:
Premier of DPRK Cabinet Backs from China
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, flew back today after concluding his official goodwill visit to China.
					 Returning home together with him were Kim Thae Bong, minister of Metal Industry, Kim Chang Sik, minister of Agriculture, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries.

articles.title: Congratulations to Ghanaian Minister of Foreign Affairs and Regional Integration
articles.content:
Congratulations to Ghanaian Minister of Foreign Affairs and Regional Integration
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Alhaji Muhammed Mumuni, on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Regional Integration of Ghana. 
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests, the message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: EU Troika Delegation Here
articles.content:
EU Troika Delegation Here
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A Troika delegation of the European Union led by Jiri Sitler, director of the Department of Asia and Pacific of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: German Photo Exhibition Held in Wonsan
articles.content:
German Photo Exhibition Held in Wonsan
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A German photo exhibition took place at the fine art exhibition hall in Kangwon Province from Mar. 17 to 21 to mark the anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Germany.
					 Officials concerned, working people in Wonsan and a staff member of the German embassy here visited the exhibition hall where they looked round photos introducing buildings of Germany registered as world cultural heritages.

articles.title: Scientific Research into Development and Use of Water Resource
articles.content:
Scientific Research into Development and Use of Water Resource
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Scientific researches into the development and utilization of water resources have been intensified in scientific research centers of the DPRK these years.
					Scientists of the Geographical Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, on the basis of comprehensive survey and estimation of the water resources in the country, have solved many problems arising in developing and making rational use of them in various sectors of the national economy.
					
					They settled the scientific and technological problems arising in the construction of a new kind of power station based on a method of developing hydraulic resources completely differing from those of the existing dam-type or watercourse-changing power stations, thus greatly contributing to bringing earlier the completion of power station construction.
					
					And they went to hydropower stations, the electricity production of which has been hindered by deposit, and clarified the moving feature of the deposit scientifically and advanced ways for building structures to prevent deposit. They thus made it possible to increase electricity output considerably compared with the existing ones.
					
					Those of the Hydrologic Research Institute under the Hydro-Meteorology Service invented a scientific water management method for dealing with the accumulation on river-bed, which is helpful to ensuring the water quality of River Taedong on a high level.
					
					They calculated in a scientific way the quantity and time of water discharge from barrages and reservoirs so as to economize water to the maximum while maintaining the speed of water flow and washing away the deposit. As a result, they have successfully ensured the exchanging of water of River Taedong on several occasions up to now and prevented the deposit in the river.
					
					Scientists of the Environmental Conservation Research Institute under the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation have developed a flocculant which makes it possible to ensure 98 percent purification of industrial spent water with the result that clean water always flows into the Taedong River.

articles.title: DPRK, First Tax Free Country
articles.content:
DPRK, First Tax Free Country
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK promulgated the historic law on liquidating the tax system, a legacy of the old society, once and for all on March 21, Juche 63 (1974), declaring the DPRK, the first tax free country in the world.
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the Third Session of the Fifth Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK adopted and promulgated the law to the whole world.
					
					 He expounded the establishment of a fair tax system in his famous work "The Ten-Point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" already in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. After the national liberation (August 15, 1945), he made every possible effort to do away with the predatory tax system of the Japanese imperialists, establish a popular and democratic one in the country and lessen the tax burden of the people in a systematic way.
					
					 The DPRK reduced the income tax of the factory and office workers by 30 percent, alleviated the tax burden of private traders and industrialists considerably and scaled down the agricultural tax in kind from 25 percent of grain output to 20.1 percent again in 1955 after the Korean war, and to 8.4 percent from 1959.
					
					 Along with the progress of the socialist construction, the growth of income of the state-owned economy and the heightening of the political and ideological awareness of the working people, the agricultural tax in kind, which had been introduced right after the liberation, was completely abolished by the year of 1966 in accordance with the publication of "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country" by the President. The tax paid by the people accounted for some two percent of the state budget revenue.
					
					 He promulgated his famous work "On Abolishing the Tax System" as a law of the Supreme People's Assembly and thus abolished the tax system for good and brilliantly realized the long-cherished desire of the people. 
					
					 The promulgation of the law was a historic event which brought to reality the ardent desire of the Korean people to live in a tax-free country and made them as the proud masters of the country free from tax. This opened up a new tax-free era for the humankind and demonstrated the incomparable superiority of the Korean-style socialist system and the might of the independent national economy.

articles.title: Papers on Gravity of Joint Military Exercises Targeted against DPRK
articles.content:
Papers on Gravity of Joint Military Exercises Targeted against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets were grave military provocations and an undisguised threat of aggression. They were unpardonable acts of wrecking peace as they escalated the confrontation and tension on the Korean Peninsula and increased the danger of a nuclear war. Leading papers Saturday observe this in signed commentaries.
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle were the biggest maneuvers for a nuclear war against the DPRK in history in terms of the aggressor forces involved and their duration, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said exercises staged by the U.S. imperialist warmongers defying the DPRK's repeated warnings and the concern of the public at home and abroad proved that there is no change in their hostile policy towards it and their ambition for invading it. 
					
					 Through the recent saber rattling the bellicose forces at home abroad further rounded off the operational capability to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK any moment and, at the same time, further aggravated the military stand-off and distrust between the DPRK and the U.S. and between the north and the south. 
					
					 The prevailing situation requires the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to bolster up the army of Songun to protect the sovereignty of the nation and defend the dignified socialist system as firm as a rock, follow with vigilance the moves of the bellicose aggressor forces at home and abroad and keep themselves fully combat-ready to beat back any surprise attack. 
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the Lee group foolishly ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK, its servicepersons and people will wipe out the aggressors at a single stroke with the unpredictable decisive and crushing retaliatory strikes and accomplish the historic cause of the country's reunification.  
					
					 Minju Joson notes: The United States would be well advised to drop its wild ambition to do harm to the DPRK by force and make a switchover in its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK as early as possible. The Lee group of traitors should halt its racket of confrontation with the DPRK, mindful that its attempt to do harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces would only precipitate its own self-destruction.

articles.title: People Urged Not to Be Taken in by Imperialists' Honeyed Words
articles.content:
People Urged Not to Be Taken in by Imperialists' Honeyed Words
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The imperialists are letting loose sophism that the more there exist political parties, the better people of various strata can express their views and the more fully they can display "democracy." This is intended to woo other countries into accepting Western-style "multi-party system" and "democracy" in a bid to throw them into confusion and destabilize them and realize intervention and domination over those countries.  Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article. 
					 It goes on: 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the imperialists are intensifying the offensive for imposing "multi-party system" and "democracy" upon those countries which work hard to achieve social stability by strengthening their political forces and stick to the line of independence in a bid to topple their governments.  
					
					 The imperialists are busy with the smear campaigns against these countries, labeling them "undemocratic states" and the like, and seek to isolate them from the international community. It is part of these moves that the United States and other Western countries are imposing sanctions upon the anti-imperialist independent countries under that pretext as an allied force. 
					
					 The imperialists are still today craftily using "aid" as a bait for forcing other countries to introduce "the multi-party system" and "democracy". They are going the lengths of threatening those countries to stop giving "aid" to them for the mere reason that they are opposed to such "multi-party system" and "democracy." This suffices to prove their reactionary nature.  
					
					 The developing countries would be well advised to clearly see through the reactionary and harmful nature of the above-said "multi-party system" and "democracy" and positively struggle against the moves of the imperialists to impose those things upon them, concludes the article.

articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK to Be Observed in Italy
articles.content:
April Holidays of DPRK to Be Observed in Italy
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy released the April issue of the magazine La Voce, its organ, as a special issue on the occasions of the Day of the Sun, the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) and the 77th anniversary of the foundation of the heroic Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The magazine entitled "April 15 is the birthday of great President Kim Il Sung" and "April 9 is the anniversary of Comrade Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and April 25, the day of the foundation of the KPA."
					
					 It said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, was the great statesman who dedicated all his life to defending the sovereignty of the nation and the reunification of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the NDC, has led the struggle of the Korean people to achieve the reunification of the country and build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation on the land of the DPRK to victory and glory with his Songun revolutionary leadership true to the behest of the President.
					
					 The Korean people will surely achieve the independent reunification of the country and build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Flayed in Britain
articles.content:
Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Flayed in Britain
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Members of the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain staged a demonstration in front of the embassies of the United States and south Korea in London on March 16 and 17 in protest against the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers.
					 The demonstrators bitterly condemned the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group for staging the said saber rattling, rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense, flying flags of the DPRK and shouting slogans "Long live the DPRK!" and "Korea is one!" 
					
					 They declared that the south Korean "government" is a pro-U.S. puppet regime of an unpopular group of fascists from A to Z. 
					
					 They held that the socialist system in the DPRK is a socialist one under which the people have become masters of everything and everything in the society serves the people.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises Flayed in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises Flayed in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held a meeting on March 17 denouncing the reckless DPRK-targeted war exercises staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers. 
					 Speakers including Jo Yun Hae, chairperson of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, said at the meeting that the joint military exercises being staged by them at a time when the inter-Korean relations are driven into the worst phase of collapse and the  situation on the Korean Peninsula has grown so tense that a war may break out any moment due to the reckless confrontation policy of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are the nuclear war exercises aiming at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 They held that the U.S. and south Korean puppet clique frequently staged exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK in the past, but it is the first time that they started joint war maneuvers of such provocative and dangerous nature.
					
					 They on behalf of all the Koreans abroad bitterly denounced the U.S. and the Lee group of traitors for staging the above-said war exercises, bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula, while frantically pursuing confrontation and war quite contrary to the aspiration and wishes of the Korean nation and other world peace-loving people.
					
					 They urged the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers to stop at once the reckless joint military exercises for invading the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a activistas de soldados de vanguardia del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a activistas de soldados de vanguardia del EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea felicito a los participantes en la conferencia de los activistas de soldados de la vanguardia del EPC que tiene lugar  en esta capital.
					En la explanada frente al Palacio Memorial Kumsusan, el Dirigente respondio a las calurosas aclamaciones de los participantes en el conclave y les envio su cordial saludo.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del Estado Mayor General y general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC y general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Kuk y Hyon Chol Hae y otros miembros directivos del ejercito.
					
					El Comandante Supremo felicito calurosamente a los participantes en la conferencia quienes con el firme espiritu de defender a costa de la vida al lider, el ferviente amor a la patria y el abnegado espiritu de servicio militar, luchan valientemente en la linea avanzada del frente dedicando sin vacilacion la juventud y la vida y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Senalo que nuestros soldados de la vanguardia,  valientes combatientes de la primera linea del frente son los patriotas quienes sin distinguir el viento frio, la nieve y la lluvia, defienden con el fusil la tranquilidad de la patria y el pueblo, los camaradas de la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar) y preciosos tesoros de nuestro partido que dedican con valor su juventud en la primera linea del frente y evaluo altamente sus meritos.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente se encontro con los constructores militares quienes realizaron las proezas laborales en la construccion socialista y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					El respondio a las calurosas aclamaciones de ellos en la plaza frente al mismo palacio y les envio cordial saludo.
					
					Participaron alli el ministro de las FAP y vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del EMG del EPC y general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, el primer subjefe de la DPG del EPC y general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak y otros comandantes de unidad.
					
					El Comandante Supremo felicito calurosamente a los constructores militares quienes al poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, realizaron las hazanas heroicas en la construccion socialista y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Subrayo que los constructores militares de la unidad son los combatientes de materializacion a ultranza que al construir magnificamente la piscina de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Patinadero Cubierto, el Complejo de Piscinas y Servicios de Cultura Fisica Changgwangwon y otras numerosas obras monumentales manifestaron  energicamente a todo el mundo el poderio de Corea del Juche e hicieron un gran aporte a la prosperidad del pais y  anadio que nuestro pueblo no olvidara para siempre las brillantes proezas  de ellos que no saben cosas imposibles.

articles.title: ATCC informa retencion de 2 norteamericanos
articles.content:
ATCC informa retencion de 2 norteamericanos
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ATCC) -- Segun la informacion difundida este sabado por la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea, fueron retenidos el pasado dia 17 dos norteamericanos quienes han entrado ilegalmente en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por la zona fronteriza con China.
					  Los intrusos estan sometidos ahora a la investigacion de un organo competente, agrega la nota.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il regresa a Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il regresa a Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ATCC) -- El premier del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il, repatrio el dia 21 por via aerea tras concluir su visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Popular China.
					Regresaron junto con el el ministro de Industria Metalurgica Kim Thae Bong, el ministro de Agricultura Kim Chang Sik, el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el ministro de Cultura Kang Nung Su y el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Kim Yong Il y el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero Jon Yong Jin.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il visita varios lugares de Beijing
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il visita varios lugares de Beijing
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ATCC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il, y su comitiva visitaron el dia 19 la Central Termoelectrica Huaneng de Beijing. 
					Tras escuchar el historial y el estado de gestion de esta empresa, los visitantes pasaron revista a varios procesos productivos incluyendo la sala de control general.
					
					  Tambien, recorrieron el dia 20 el Parque Norte del Parque Nacional de China y el Palacio Verano.  
					
					Terminada la visita, Kim dejo letras en los libros de visitas.
